title: ABM Study Group2025/1 Balance
text:
Our Objectives


2nd Semester 2024
Introduce modeling concepts, ABMs, NetLogo, and the ODD Protocol (Part I)

1st Semester 2025
Explore the entire ODD Protocol, enabling participants to create and structure their own ABMs(Part II)




2nd semester 2025
Learn how to parameterize, calibrate, and analyze ABMs effectively (Parts III & IV)

1st Semester 2026


?
